## Example Table

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| echo: true
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

tbl <- tribble(
  ~"pos_neg",  ~"<8", ~"8-10", ~">10",
  "Negative", 95, 23, 45,
  "Positive", 49, 22, 25,
  )
```

```{r}
#| tbl-cap: Test
#| label: tbl-test

tbl %>% 
  janitor::adorn_totals(where = c("row", "col")) %>%
  kable(
    longtable = TRUE,
    booktabs = TRUE,
    linesep = "",
    align = c("l", "c", "c", "c", "c"),
    col.names = c("", names(.)[-1]),
  ) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" " = 1, "Inoculum volume (mL)" = 3, " " = 1), bold = TRUE) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(2:4, width = "3em")
```
